channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A thoughtful review
item.description: Thanks to Francis Wade for emailing me this review of THIS IS STRATEGY. Francis works in strategy, and I’m so delighted the book resonated the way it ...

item.title: How The Built World Is Using Smart Building Systems To Get Greener
item.description: In a year marked by record-breaking temperatures and extreme weather, embracing IoT in buildings is more than just a technological upgrade.

item.title: 10 Reasons Why Trump 2.0 Won’t Kill The Green Revolution
item.description: Trump has promised to end federal subsidies for low carbon energy projects, including startups depending on tax credits.

item.title: Broken (and not worth fixing)

item.title: Why Billionaire Investor Tom Steyer Is Bullish On Clean Energy Under Trump
item.description: Solar, wind and utility-scale battery projects are expected to keep growing regardless of the next administration’s “drill baby drill” obsession for a...

item.title: Catastrophizing toward action
item.description: A friend found a knobby growth near his knee. After a few doctor visits, it was diagnosed as cancer. A cancer diagnosis is a self-sufficient catastrop...

item.title: Trump Promised To Make Your Medicines Cheaper. His Tariffs Will Make Them More Expensive
item.description: Pharmaceuticals have mostly been spared from past tariff battles, but this time they’re on the block.

item.title: “What should I do now?”

item.title: Unforced errors
